title: Glary Buttploos 12/18: Pearl Harbor, Snow Squall, Adam Driver, Tekashi69
itunes:title: Glary Buttploos 12/18: Pearl Harbor, Snow Squall, Adam Driver, Tekashi69
description:
On this episode of Glary Buttploos Jack is joined by Anna and DJ Danl to discuss people comparing the impeachment to Pearl Harbor, the Snow Squall enveloping New York, Adam Driver's performance in 'Marriage Story', and Tekashi69 only getting 2 years of his potential 37 year sentence.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
